EmailTemplate.name: Employee raises a resignation request mail to Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Request: {!Case.Contact} has raised request to {!Case.Type}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Case_Assignee__c},
{!Case.Type} has raised a resignation request on {!Case.CreatedDate}. As per their request, {!Case.Contact} has proposed {!Case.Last_Working_Date__c} as their last working day.
Click here to view the request.
Kindly take appropriate action on the request and if necessary, schedule a discussion with [Employee Name] to understand the reasons behind their decision to resign and see if any potential alternatives could be explored.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
